name: Spinvaders
description:
Spinvaders thrusts you into an endless space battle against a range of deadly and ceaselessly persistent robotic spinning droid ships.

You must scan your surroundings for vital abandoned fuel pods and travel through wormholes in the very fabric of spacetime to discover multiple parallel universes.

Beware though, the spinvaders will follow you through the blackholes!

And now in version 2.0 you must also avoid increasing numbers of asteroids which your shield is powerless to protect you against. Can you steer through the asteroid field causing your enemy to crash?

Featuring Game Center integration, Retina Display compatible high definition graphics and 4 original theme tunes.
